reviews.review: Puzzles in fps format. Cool story. Mind bending.

По сравнению с первой частью, игра превзошла сама себя.
Я молчу про графику, она очень хорошая, даже сейчас, шутки и локализация сделаны добротно и качественно. Сюжет интересный и даже иногда заставляет просто задуматься. Головоломки сделаны сложно, но часы убивает просто отлично!
In poche parole un gioco fantastico.In 7h finisci la storia poi c'è la modalità coop da giocare con gli amici.Da prendere solo se si è giocati al primo.

Анекдот
Один еврейский мальчик очень любил читать. он читал все, что попадалось ему под руку, и обожал ходить в свой любимый книжный магазин. однажды он понял, что прочел уже все, что там продавалось. мальчик спросил хозяина, есть ли в магазине что нибудь, чего он никогда не видел. хозяин сказал, что есть, и достал книгу под названием "смерть". он охотно продал ее со скидкой, всего за 10 шекелей. однако он предупредил мальчика, чтобы тот никогда не открывал первую страницу. мальчик вернулся домой, прочитал книгу и остался доволен. но ему всегда хотелось узнать, что же там, на первой странице. однажды искушение стало слишком сильным, и он пролистал книгу к самому началу, и умер от ужаса. на первой странице было написано:
"рекомендуемая цена 5 шекелей"
Сюжетка интересная, кооп отличный, прошли с другом весь кооп, очень веселе
Excelente juego muy entretenido para jugar con amigos

10/10, would recommend to anyone who loves any other Valve games. The puzzles are fun and introduce new mechanics to give it a fresh new feel from the original Portal, the comedy still holds up today, the multiplayer is incredibly fun, and the story is very well written for a game that was never supposed to get a sequel. Oh, and how could I forget? If you've played this game to death on console like I have, that's perfectly fine. You can play brand new community made tests that are much more challenging than the base game. Do yourself a favour and play it.

You already know.
Despite being a simple puzzle game, Portal 2 manages to deliver one of the best story I have ever seen in any game, along with some of the best and most well written characters and jokes.

É bom? É. Vale a pena comprar? Sim. 

Portal 2 faz tudo o que Portal 1 fez, porém melhor e maior.

EXCETO em dois pontos: Wheatley e loadings.

Wheatley deve ser considerado um dos piores, mais sem graça e desagradáveis personagens já feitos na história dos videogames. Super chato, não cala a boca um minuto e ainda tem um sotaque britânico pesadíssimo. Irritante demais. Se o jogo tivesse só a GlaDos como antagonista, teria sido muito melhor.

Os loadings continuam vastos e quebram constantemente o ritmo do jogo. Esse foi um aspecto que não envelheceu bem em Portal 2, graças à ultrapassada Source engine.

Tirando esses dois pontos, é um ótimo jogo e por um preço bastante acessível.

My legs are broken and the orb robot lied.

Ultimate video game classic!

The perfect blend between puzzle and platforming.

Hours of fun to be had between the main story, Co-op, the Perpetual Testing Initiative, and dozens of mods that pretty much reinvent the game.

富有创意的一款游戏，我很喜欢

A ten year old game perhaps but this is an amazing platform/puzzle game. Stephen Merchant brings a lot of humour to proceedings and there's a lot of story going on throughout. As with Half Life, you think you're nearing the end of the game and then you find there's still loads of content remaining. J K Simmons has some great dialogue in the latter part of the game too.
On top of the excellent single player game there's also an innovative co-operative game to play too (actual co-op requiring genuine teamwork, not just two people playing through the game at the same time).
Some of the puzzles are quite tricky to figure out but there's a good sense of achievement when you finally work out the solutions, and as I managed to complete the co-op game with my 4 year old the challenges are obviously not entirely impossible.
The only negative I found was that you really need to know what you're doing with regards to setting up your controllers in the Steam settings (especially if, like me, you're using one PS4 controller and one Xbox One controller) but that's not really an issue with the game itself as it works perfectly once you've sorted that out.
This is a 10/10 game in my opinion.
